name: Punchmade Dev
description: '''Punchmade Dev''', is a rapper and producer based in [[Lexington, Kentucky]]. Best known for the popularization of [[scam rap]], a sub-genre of [[hip hop]], he has produced various songs and videos relating to fraud, such as a "[[Wire fraud|Wire Fraud]] Tutorial", "Internet Swiping", and "Million Dollar Criminal" which have obtained several million views on [[social media platforms]].
